verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%>, ye kine <S%H6510><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, that are in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>, which oppress <S%H6231><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%>, which crush <S%H7533><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%>, which say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to their masters <S%H113><s%>, Bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and let us drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

The YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by his holiness <S%H6944><s%>, that, lo, the days <S%H3117><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon you, that he will take you away <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with hooks <S%H6793><s%>, and your posterity <S%H319><s%> with fishhooks <S%H1729><s%> <S%H5518><s%>.

And ye shall go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the breaches <S%H6556><s%>, every <S%H802><s%> cow at that which is before her; and ye shall cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them into the palace <S%H2038><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, and transgress <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; at Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8685><s%> transgression <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>, and your tithes <S%H4643><s%> after three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H3117><s%>:

And offer <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8763><s%> a sacrifice of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> with leaven <S%H2557><s%>, and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and publish <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the free offerings <S%H5071><s%>: for this <S%H3651><s%> liketh <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you, O ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And I also have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you cleanness <S%H5356><s%> of teeth <S%H8127><s%> in all your cities <S%H5892><s%>, and want <S%H2640><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in all your places <S%H4725><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And also I have withholden <S%H4513><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the rain <S%H1653><s%> from you, when there were yet three <S%H7969><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> to the harvest <S%H7105><s%>: and I caused it to rain <S%H4305><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon one <S%H259><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, and caused it not to rain <S%H4305><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon another <S%H259><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> piece <S%H2513><s%> was rained <S%H4305><s%> <S%H8735><s%> upon, and the piece <S%H2513><s%> whereupon it rained <S%H4305><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not withered <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

So two <S%H8147><s%> or three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> wandered <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, to drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>; but they were not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

I have smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you with blasting <S%H7711><s%> and mildew <S%H3420><s%>: when your gardens <S%H1593><s%> and your vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and your fig trees <S%H8384><s%> and your olive trees <S%H2132><s%> increased <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, the palmerworm <S%H1501><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

I have sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> among you the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: your young men <S%H970><s%> have I slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and have taken away <S%H7628><s%> your horses <S%H5483><s%>; and I have made the stink <S%H889><s%> of your camps <S%H4264><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto your nostrils <S%H639><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

I have overthrown <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8804><s%> some of you, as 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> overthrew <S%H4114><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, and ye were as a firebrand <S%H181><s%> plucked out <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8716><s%> of the burning <S%H8316><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore thus will I do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and because <S%H6118><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this unto thee, prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8734><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

For, lo, he that formeth <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and createth <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>, and declareth <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8688><s%> unto man <S%H120><s%> what is his thought <S%H7808><s%>, that maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the morning <S%H7837><s%> darkness <S%H5890><s%>, and treadeth <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%>, The 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, is his name <S%H8034><s%>.
